subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the UI component.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<CollectionWidgetItem, any> | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to data.

subMembers.name: displayExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field whose values should be displayed.

subMembers.name: itemComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [itemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: itemRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [itemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: itemTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for items.

subMembers.name: items
subMembers.description: An array of items displayed by the UI component.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: Specifies the currently selected value. May be an object if [dataSource] contains objects, the store [key] is specified, and [valueExpr] is not set.

subMembers.name: valueExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides unique values to the UI component's [value].
